entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 15. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 19 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 25. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Wednesday 15 March 2023
